alert.note: Alert for Bottineau (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 10:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau in North Dakota... .Snow melt and recent rainfall is making its way through the Souris River system and is expected to produce minor flooding in the Westhope area. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Souris River near Westhope. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1414.0 feet, Water is almost valley-wide. The area flooded is grass covered and no buildings are affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1414.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Thursday was 1414.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady above flood stage at 1414.2 feet. - Flood stage is 1414.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 1413.4 feet on 11/11/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
